page.title: 10GOVERNMENT
page.content: So far people are happy with the present government, although teachers are striking because they feel they are not being paid enough. Due to the strike, O'level pupils are suffering. Parents are complaining to the Council although they cannot really do anything. It is the Burnham Committee, who decides the pay. {HEALTH AND ACCIDENTS At Fairthorne Manor the few accidents they do have mostly happen on the assault course. In serious accidents the patient is taken to Southampton General Hospital, which is one of the nearest hospitals, the other being Queen Alexandra Hospital. There are no disabled people in this area. The few accidents that do occur are mainly young girls falling off horses and accidents on the farm.
